name: EXTRALIFE
description:
This is a project I made for the Driftwood Gaming, Build Your Own Game Jam.

We were asked to use at least two from a number of themes .  I tried to use as many as I could but the main focus is on babies, dungeon crawler, purple and permadeath.  

If party members die in battle, they are permanently dead. If the MC dies, it's game over. To get the best ending make sure none of your party die in battle.
